column4: does anyone know about moving files from a old partition to a new partition on the same hard drive both with ubuntu installed i need to move my videos and music files from my old partition to my new partition and get rid of the old one
get rid of the old partition
if you mount both drives, you can just copy them
when i try to copy them it just fills my hard drive even more i have a whole 28gb left and need to transfer 120gb of media
you could have mentioned that
you need to find a place to put it
why can you not help with that?
How would any of us know where to put your files? We can tell you how, but not where
you need to put everything on the old partition somewhere first
what do you mean by put it somewhere?
what you need to do is first move the files off the partition you want to delete
big usb hard disk
apparently you have no way to delete the partition
is there a site or something that would allow me to just store 120gb of files so i can reinstall and then get them
Uploading it would take years
if one exited ;-)
you need to have a place to store it
